answers.answer: I am but only modified rest right now. I went in or L&D at 30 weeks. I was having short contractions that were more like spasms every 2-3 min. I'm on procardia now. This is my 7th pregnancy. I have 4 kiddos and 2 angel babies.

Yes I've only been on bed rest for a day and I'm already going crazy haha. Did procardia completely stop your contractions?  So far it seems it has only spreaded them to every ten mins for me and makes me very nautious

Yes, I was on bed rest from 25 weeks and then my water broke at 30 weeks and now I'm in the hospital until 34 weeks where I will be induced. :/ I'm almost 32 weeks and I'm praying I don't go into labor before then! Good luck dear(: I'm sure everything will be fine!
I only have a handful each day now. It's far better than last week.
@bittybean....o man I wish the best for u! It must be hard on bedrest in the hospital!

question: Yesterday I was put on strict pelvic rest and bed rest. I have been having contractions every two mins but my cervix is still long thick and closed which is a good thing!! I was put on procardia and visarul to try to stop contractions so far I have felt no pain. This is my 3rd pregnancy. I had my first daughter at 29 weeks due to severe preeclampsia. My second was full term but traumatic delivery due to low blood platets. Both are now healthy and bIg :)....I have lots of cramping and constant back pain. Anyone else goung through the same this early in pregnancy?  Please share your stories :)
title: 26 wks preterm contractions/bed rest
